thread.title: TERRY WHITE
thread.title_full: Nebraska Furniture Mart reviewed by TERRY WHITE

author: TERRY WHITE
title: TERRY WHITE
text: NFM has a unparalleled inventory and the pricing can't be beat. Since I live in Dallas/Fort Worth, so I can shop on-line or physically in virtually any national or major furniture store, electronics store, appliance store, and home decor store even volume discount ones. The NFM store makes it a one-stop for me and they will beat the price on any other store in the area, and that's saying a lot. Also, with the giant store I can even look through the returns and get the item that day (and the parking is truly awesome).
